name: SHARED FUTURES
goal:
The association which is devoid of any spirit of profit has the non profit purpose of international utility of
focus on humanitarian aid ,fight against climate change, promote renewable energy and health for all, promote socio economic and cultural development......
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Culture, Education and training, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Climate change, promote renewable energy,carry out awareness campaigns for more green energy and promote green energy and for clean environment
